ShowAction.Message: Please fill in Systolic BP, Diastolic BP, and Heart Rate for both positions in the log below.

HideAction.Message: The log should only be completed if 'Yes' was selected for the previous question.

DiscrepancyNoteAction.Message: Temperature should be between 36.4 and 37.6 if in degrees Celcius. Please verify your response.
Temperature should be between 97.6 and 99.6 if in degrees Fahrenheit. Please verify your response.
Height is out of the expected range (121 - 213 cm). Please verify your response.
Height is out of the expected range (48 - 84 inches). Please verify your response.
Weight is out of the expected range (70 - 600 lbs). Please verify your response.
Weight is out of the expected range (31 - 272 kg). Please verify your response.

RuleDef.Name: Vitals: Show/Hide/Insert
RuleDef.Description: If 'Yes' is selected, the log should show and 'Supine' and 'Standing' should insert into the Position column.

RuleDef.Name: Vitals: Temp C
RuleDef.Description: Temperature in Degrees Celcius should be between 35.4 and 36.6 degrees.
RuleDef.Expression: (I_VITAL_VS_TEMP lt 36.4 or I_VITAL_VS_TEMP gt 37.6) and I_VITAL_VS_TUNIT eq 1

RuleDef.Name: Vitals: Temp F
RuleDef.Description: Temperature in Degrees Fahrenheit should be between 97.6 and 99.6 degrees.
RuleDef.Expression: (I_VITAL_VS_TEMP lt 97.6 or I_VITAL_VS_TEMP gt 99.6) and I_VITAL_VS_TUNIT eq 2

RuleDef.Name: Vitals: Height CM
RuleDef.Description: Height in cm should be between 121-213 cm.
RuleDef.Expression: (I_VITAL_VS_HGHT lt 121 or I_VITAL_VS_HGHT gt 213) and I_VITAL_VS_UNITS eq 2

RuleDef.Name: Vitals: Height IN
RuleDef.Description: Height in inches should be between 48-84 in.
RuleDef.Expression: (I_VITAL_VS_HGHT lt 48 or I_VITAL_VS_HGHT gt 84) and I_VITAL_VS_UNITS eq 1

RuleDef.Name: Vitals: Weight LBS
RuleDef.Description: Height in cm should be between 121-213 cm.
RuleDef.Expression: (I_VITAL_VS_WGHT lt 70 or I_VITAL_VS_WGHT gt 600) and I_VITAL_VS_UNITS eq 1

RuleDef.Name: Vitals: Weight KG
RuleDef.Description: Height in inches should be between 48-84 in.
RuleDef.Expression: (I_VITAL_VS_WGHT lt 31 or I_VITAL_VS_WGHT gt 272) and I_VITAL_VS_UNITS eq 2
